title: Gorgeous 5 Bedroom Townhome, 3 stories and a back patio!
posting_body: Welcome to The Villas in Bellevue Apartments
Convenience and sophistication take center stage at The Villas in Bellevue apartments.
Located in Bellevue's Lake Hills neighborhood, our location allows you to step outside to Lake Hills Village, where dining, shopping, and many services await you.
Amplify your expectations with nearby Marymoor Park and its many amenities and concert series.
If you don't feel like leaving home, sit back and be a part of our very own outdoor concert event steps away in the Village Plaza Amphitheater.
Enjoy your own private veranda, or spend time with friends at one of the many trendy locales in the Village Plaza.
On those summer weekends, don’t forget the Farmer’s Market, where you can pick up fresh, local produce.
In your backyard, you will find a lush greenbelt where you can tour a cedar forest and learn about local wildlife.
Follow This Link for More Information:
This is a 5 Bedroom, 3.5 Bath, approximately 1924 Sq.
- Private dining rooms with breakfast bars
- Two, three, and four bedroom apartment homes
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
